src:
Performa Tira Persikabo Menurun, Persebaya Ingin Curi Poin di Cibinong
05 Nov 2019, 20:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya akan berusaha memanfaatkan performa PS Tira Persikabo yang sedang menurun. Green Force akan berusaha mencuri poin ketika bertandang ke Stadion Pakansari, Cibinong.
Tira Persikabo diketahui belum pernah menang dalam sebelas pertandingan terakhir. Laskar Padjajaran bahkan harus terlempar ke papan tengah klasemen karena performa buruknya.
"Mudah-mudahan aja paling tidak kita minimal bisa mendapatkan poin satu bagus, poin tiga istimewa," ungkap pelatih Persebaya, Aji Santoso, Selasa (5/11/2019).
Namun, Aji tidak mau banyak berkomentar mengenai kekuatan lawan. Aji memilih merahasiakannya sebagai bagian dari strategi menghadapi tim besutan Rahmad Darmawan tersebut.
"Enggak usah komentari tim lain, kalau pun tahu buat kita sendiri. Tidak mungkin saya sampaikan di umum," tegas mantan pelatih Arema FC itu.

Scroll ke bawah untuk informasi selengkapnya ya Bolaneters.
text:
Tira Persikabo's Performance Declines, Persebaya Wants to Steal Points in Cibinong
05 Nov 2019, 20:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Persebaya Surabaya will try to take advantage of the declining performance of PS Tira Persikabo. Green Force will try to steal points when they travel to Pakansari Stadium, Cibinong.
Tira Persikabo is known to have never won in the last eleven matches. Padjadjaran Warriors even had to be thrown into the middle of the standings because of poor performance.
"Hopefully, at least we can get at least one good point, three special points," said Persebaya coach, Aji Santoso, Tuesday (11/05/2019).
However, Aji did not want to say much about the strength of the opponent. Aji chose to keep it a secret as part of the strategy to face the team made by Rahmad Darmawan.
"There is no need to comment on other teams, even if we know for ourselves. It is impossible for me to say in public," said the former Arema FC coach.

Scroll down for more information, Bolaneters.
